oauth.title: MGZon OAuth Documentation
oauth.introductionDesc: MGZon OAuth documentation provides a comprehensive guide for integrating your applications with our platform using the OAuth 2.0 protocol.
oauth.introductionDetails: The OAuth 2.0 protocol allows you to authenticate securely and access MGZon resources such as user data, products, and advertisements. This section covers setup, scopes, flows, and integration examples.
oauth.setupDesc: To get started with OAuth on MGZon, you need to register your application to obtain client credentials (Client Credentials).
oauth.step1: Log in to your MGZon account.
oauth.step3: Click 'Create New App' and fill in the details.
oauth.step4: Save the client ID and secret securely.
oauth.sellerSetupDesc: For sellers, set up API keys to manage products, inventory, and integrations.
oauth.sellerStep1: Log in to your seller account.
oauth.sellerStep3: Generate a new key with required permissions.
oauth.sellerStep4: Copy and store the key securely.
oauth.sellerApiKeyExample: Example: Creating a Seller API Key

scopes.title: Scopes
scopes.description: Scopes define the permissions your app can access. Choose scopes based on your app's needs.
scopes.profileRead: Read basic user profile data (e.g., name, email).
scopes.productsRead: Read product data (e.g., title, price, stock).

oauth.sellerIntegrationsDesc: Integrate with external platforms for product import/export and inventory sync.
oauth.importProductsDesc: Import products from providers like Shopify.
oauth.exportProductsDesc: Export products to platforms like ShipBob.
oauth.syncInventoryDesc: Synchronize inventory levels with external providers.
oauth.flowDesc: The OAuth 2.0 authorization code flow for secure authentication.
oauth.flowStep1: Redirect user to MGZon authorization endpoint.

errors.unauthorizedClient: Client not authorized for this grant type.

oauth.advertisingGetStarted: Get started with ads in your dashboard:
oauth.advertisementsJsDesc: Create an ad campaign using Node.js.
oauth.advertisementsPythonDesc: Create an ad campaign using Python.

Sellerchatbote.fetchAIStatusError: Failed to fetch AI assistant status
Sellerchatbote.limitExceeded: You have reached the free limit! Activate the monthly subscription to continue: Subscribe Now

Premium.title: AI Assistant Premium Subscription
Premium.description: Unlock the full potential of the AI Assistant with a Premium subscription!
Premium.feature1: Unlimited use of the AI Assistant
Premium.feature2: Automatic template and custom design creation

Chatbote.emptyMessage: Please enter a message before sending.
Chatbote.serverUnreachable: Sorry, I could not reach the server.

oauth.introductionDesc: MGZon's OAuth provides a secure and standardized way to authorize applications to access user data and manage resources without sharing login credentials. It follows the OAuth 2.0 standard, enabling seamless integration with the MGZon platform.
oauth.flowDesc: The OAuth flow in MGZon involves redirecting the user to an authorization page, where they grant permissions, then exchanging the authorization code for an access token, which can be used to access protected resources.
oauth.sellerSetupDesc: For sellers, MGZon offers a simplified API for managing products and inventory. API keys can be generated for direct access without the full OAuth flow, ideal for backend integrations.
oauth.sellerApiKeyExample: Example: You can generate an API key via the seller dashboard using a POST request to /api/v1/keys with permissions like products:read or inventory:write.
oauth.scopesDesc: Scopes in MGZon define the level of access granted to applications. Examples include profile:read for reading user data, products:write for managing products, and ads:write for creating ad campaigns.
oauth.advertisingDesc: MGZon's advertising API allows sellers to create and manage ad campaigns. You can integrate ads using scopes like ads:read and ads:write to access campaign data and create new ads.

Chatbote.refineSearch: You can refine your search by specifying the category or price range.
Chatbote.oauthDocsInstructions: Check the relevant section in the OAuth documentation for more details.
Chatbote.gptOssInstructions: This is a general response from the GPT‑OSS‑120B model.
Chatbote.requestProcessingError: Sorry, I couldn’t process your request.
Chatbote.chatbotFallback: Sorry, I didn't understand your question. Try rephrasing or ask something else!

company.title: About MGZon
company.description: MGZon is a leading platform empowering developers and businesses with innovative tools and services.

email.title: Email
email.description: Reach out to our support team via email for technical inquiries or general questions.
email.details: Contact our support team at support@mgzon.com. We aim to respond within 24 hours during business days (Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 5 PM EST).

phone.title: Phone Support
phone.details: Reach us at +20 1212444617, available Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 5 PM EST.

hours.title: Support Hours
hours.description: Check the availability of our support team.
hours.details: Our support team is available Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 5 PM EST. Enterprise support is available 24/7 upon request.

apiDocs.title: API Documentation
apiDocs.description: Explore our comprehensive API documentation for integrating MGZon services.
apiDocs.details: Includes guides on authentication, endpoints, and code examples in Python and JavaScript.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about account setup and billing.
faq.details: Our FAQ is updated regularly based on user feedback.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.description: Dive into our detailed guides on using the MGZon platform.
docs.details: Covers account management, best practices, and advanced configurations in multiple languages.

contactUs.title: Contact Support
contactUs.description: Reach out to our team for personalized assistance.
contactUs.details: Use live chat, email, or phone for quick responses.

community.title: Community
community.description: Join our community forums to share knowledge and collaborate.
community.details: Participate in forums or contribute to open-source projects on GitHub.

tickets.title: Support Tickets

tickets.details: Track your ticket in real-time via our support portal.

mgzon.description: Learn about our leading platform for innovative solutions.
mgzon.details: MGZon empowers businesses and developers with cutting-edge tools and services.

mission.title: Our Mission
